Type.BattleDialog: This must be the Library… Be on your guard.
Strike fast, and press hard!
None shall stop the breath of the wilderness!
I won’t kneel before anyone who’s weaker than me!
Hahaha! You put up a good one.
Who will… lead them in the future…?
One should know well when to bow down…
Don’t let the foe overpower you!
The key is to stay firm rather than back down.
With fortified faith, we must go on.
Haha! For all the scary stories that friend told me… It was simple!
Don’t get careless until it’s over. Got it?!
You couldn’t stop me!
There aren’t too many of them!
I’ll go first and take care of them!
The Library… It doesn’t look like it’ll be an easy job, as its reputation suggests.
Well, we’ve dealt with similar jobs before…
It should be fine. Let’s get going!
Good. Time to head back!
This wasn’t nearly enough to make me falter!
How about a pint on our way back?
What are the books we earned called, by the way?
Books containing info… I hope they’re helpful for us.
…Acknowledging my weakness is important as well.
Shoot… I wasn’t quite capable enough…
Don’t let me bother you…
To perish like this…
I did my best… I have no regrets.
I won’t stand back!
This isn’t a good look.
The situation got awkward…
…We can’t give up here.
This isn’t over yet.
Haha! What a rush!
This won’t be the most difficult request we take!
Now we push ahead!
They fall at last!
I see the gaps in your defense clearly!
